text: Zoosystematics and Evolution is a peer-reviewed open access scientific journal covering zoological systematics and evolution. It was established in 1898 as Mitteilungen aus der Zoologischen Sammlung des Museums für Naturkunde in Berlin and obtained its current title in 2008. The journal was established in 1898 and is published by Pensoft Publishers on behalf of the Museum für Naturkunde. The editor-in-chief is Matthias Glaubrecht (Museum für Naturkunde). == Abstracting and indexing == The journal is abstracted and indexed in == References == ==External links== * Category:Systematics journals Category:Publications established in 1898 Category:Creative Commons Attribution-licensed journals Category:English-language journals Category:Zoology journals Category:Pensoft Publishers academic journals
title: Zoosystematics and Evolution
